column1: International Business Management with pathways in General Management, Entrepreneurship, Marketing and Project Management (MSc)
column3: Faculty of Business and Social Sciences
column5: This course is ideal if you aspire to a career in consulting or general management in many sectors, including retail, media, healthcare, telecommunications, real estate, oil and gas, and energy. You will acquire the skills to become a dynamic business manager and work effectively in multicultural teams anywhere in the world. You will apply your knowledge to practical business situations including a consultancy project with a real business. There is also the opportunity to specialise in a variety of business disciplines, including project management, marketing, and entrepreneurship to market yourself more competitively.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years full time with a professional placement
